definition: without stopping, at all times, a flight made without intermediate stops between source and destination
details:
adverb
- without stopping
= example: without stopping
= synonyms: round the clock
adjective
- at all times
= synonyms: around-the-clock, day-and-night, round-the-clock, always, ever, e'er
- (of a journey especially a flight) occurring without stops
= example: (of a journey especially a flight) occurring without stops
noun
- a flight made without intermediate stops between source and destination
= example: a flight made without intermediate stops between source and destination
= synonyms: nonstop flight
